title: भारत बंद के दौरान पुणे में संस्कृति स्कूल की बस पर हमला नहीं हुआ, भ्रामक तस्वीरें वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: So called ‘Opposition Parties’ u have every right to protest but misguiding youth, targeting innocent school children, destroying public property & trying to instill fear in citizens for ur own cheap political gains is really deplorable.
